page.title: 12VILLAGE STUDY-EATON.
page.content: {SCHOOL}THE SCHOOL WAS FOUNDED ABOUT 1835 BY THE LOCAL LANDOWNERS.IT WAS SUPPORTED BY VOLUNTARY SUBSCRIPTIONS AND THE CHILDREN PAID A FEW PENCE EVERY WEEK UP UNTIL THE END OF THE 19TH CENTURY.THE NUMBERS NEVER ROSE ABOVE 45 AND WHEN THE POPULATION OF THE SCHOOL DECLINED IN THE 20TH CENTURY THE SCHOOL WAS CLOSED IN 1937 AND THE CHILDREN WENT TO GAMSTON SCHOOL WHICH IS STILL THE CASE TODAY.TODAY THE OLD SCHOOL BUILDINGS ARE USED AS A PRIVATE DWELLING. {COLLEGE}THE MANOR HOUSE AND GROUNDS WAS USED AS A MATERNITY HOSPITAL DURING THE 1939-45 WAR.AFTER THE WAR IT WAS BOUGHT BY NOTTINGHAMSHIRE COUNTY COUNCIL AND TURNED INTO THE FIRST WOMEN'S TRAINING COLLEGE FOR TEACHERS IN THE COUNTY OF NOTTINGHAMSHIRE.LATER MEN WERE ADMITTED AND IT CONTINUED UNTIL 1980.
